item.description:
We can meet at Never Road Park and carpool. This sounds like a really nice Event.

Wake up and head to Northwest Park this morning for the annual Friends of Northwest Park Pancake Breakfast in the Warming Shed. Bring an appetite for a full breakfast of pancakes and sausage smothered in 100% pure maple syrup made right at Windsor' s very own Northwest Park. Refreshment choices include orange juice, coffee, tea and hot chocolate. $5.00 for adults and $4.00 for children.

We'll meet at 9:00 for breakfast.

If you want to hike with us, but no breakfast, come at 9:45 and meet us outside the Warming Shed.
item.how_to_find_us: We can meet at Nevers Park and carpool to Northwest Park.
item.why: Because it is fun to meet other groups.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Pancake Breakfast and Walk
